Posts.Content: Good morning. I found a lump a couple months ago.. I am lumpy.. Went to dr on wed, she did measuring and ordered a stat mammo and ultrasound for Thursday.. Both mammo and ultrasound show a mass.. 4cm with shadowing and tissue distortion. I go in tomorrow for biopsy.. I am scared., and everyone is sounding urgent.. But a birad of 4 isn't that bad right? My radiologist looked at me in my face at least 3 times saying she is not liking what she is seeing...
Posts.Title: Birad 4 showing shadowing and tissue distortion
